name: Ball Bash: Brick Breaker
description:
Ball Bash the #1 game designed to challenge your dexterity and skill. Control your fate as you smash through bricks and avoid death in this fun, retro themed classic. Enjoy hours of game play while you compete against your friends. Can you get to the top of the leaderboards?

Game Features:
- Exciting game play
- Leaderboards on every level!
- Heart pounding music and great graphics*

You haven't played a great brick breaker game until this one! Progress throughout three level packs and make your way to the top. Levels become more and more challenging as you get more and more skilled. Part puzzle, part smash, all fun! Ball Bash will entertain you for hours.

*Music by Colton Leavitt
